title: Are there any books where the main character falls in love with death? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, there's “Death Takes A Holiday”, which has had two movies made from the source 1924 Italian play script, one in 1934, and “Meet Joe Black” in 1998. It also was a Broadway play in 1929, and they did a TV version in 1971 AND tried a musical version on Broadway in 2011. In my opinion, both the original black and white movie and the 1998 were excellent, though the story tweaked a little bit between versions. Can't speak about the play versions, though, since I never got to see those.
There are many comic books where this happens : Deadpool Thanos Sandman
